source.name: Storm Prediction Report
source.description: The National Weather Service Storm Prediction Center (SPC) provides daily RSS feeds summarizing today's latest information about tornado and severe thunderstorm watches, mesoscale discussions, convective day 1-3 outlooks, and fire weather outlooks.  Although available to all, the data provided may be of particular value to weather professionals and students of meteorological sciences.
